ithin thamange awashyathawaya paththaka thiyala ratata loketa pennanna eeta yamak ganna thama hamoma balanne,udaharanayak widiyata gamaka magulak gaththath ratata pennanna thama ganna balanne,ratath athin gaththath thamange yudha balaya kochchara wishalada kiyala loketa pennanna dagalanawa.dakunu koriyawa,amarikawa ee wage ratawal dekak.thawa kochchara pennana krama thiyenawada?teliwison eka gaththath karanne pennana eeka,film ekak gaththath karanne pennana eeka,wadipurama oya pennana eeka thiyenne isthiri parsaweta nowa,ekane apita samahara lassana filmsuth balanna nathi wela thiyenne.ayi ithin ape unuth wadiyenma balana eka aran pennana unwa dala makat karanawa.kiwwata sori wenna,sandesha kawya walath isthirinwa makat karana ekane kale.

kihipa deneku dengu rakthapatha una ho dengu kampana thathwayata path wiya haka.roga lakshanathada una, hisaradaya, as yata wedanawa, peshi ha sandhi kakkuma, same rathu paha lapa athiwima, wamanaya, aahara aruchiya, dengu unehi lakshanaya.dengu rakthapatha una roga lakshana nam,dina 2 - 7 dakwa pawathina adhika unasama yata kuda rathu pallam, widuru mas walin le galima, nasayen le galima, kalu/dumbauru pahathi wamanaya ho mala pahawima (aahara jirna paddhathiya thulata le galima nisa), muthra samaga le pitawimaakmawa idimimen wana adhika bade wedanawadengu kampana thathwaye roga lakshana nam,sudu mali wima, ath pa sithala wima, nadi watima wegawathwima, rudhira pidanaya aduwima.sankulathadengu kampana thathwaya nisa maranaya pawa siduwiya haka.akmawa akrithaya wima, sihi nathi wima, walippuwa, rudhira wahanaya, hruda wasthuwa akriya wima.
